mapper.select: select distinct t1.type, ifnull(t2.num, 0) num from ga_nft_public_backpack t1 left join (select `type` as type, count(*) num from ga_nft_public_backpack where user_id = #{userId} group by type) t2 on t1.type = t2.type

select t1.item_type_id, t2.name, t2.image from (select item_type_id, min(grade) grade, min(id) id from ga_nft_public_backpack where user_id = #{userId} and `type` = #{type} group by item_type_id) t1 left join ga_nft_public_backpack t2 on t1.id = t2.id
